credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: "Teaser" Announcement Poster for The Matrix Reloaded
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Engraving on holographic foil printed laid down on heavy white wove paper
description: On black background, a rain-like blanket of vertical running digital tableaux, streaming numbers and letters in neon green. At lower center, the number "2003" takes shape horizontally, followed by "www.thematrix.com", and three logos of the sponsoring companies.
name: Poster
